$775

paypal gift or check please. Sorry scan is a bit fuzzy, card is very sharp.

thanks - Rob

Wow! Beautiful card.

I'd love to pick this one up, but the card budget just isn't there right now. If you need any website work, I'd be happy to trade out! :)
My favorite card of all time!! Few bucks short though!! AWESOME CARD!!

I've always wanted to take that one in to my barber and say "I'll take a Tinker, please..."

Take Care,
Geno
